channel.title: Rzone V2 - New server reborn - Join now
channel.description:
Rzone V2 - VPS
LINKS
Forums - http://rzone.createaforum.com/
Client - http://www.fileden.com/files/2012/3/9/3275987/RzoneV2.jar
Client - http://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=RzoneV2
[b]Features[/b]
- VPS hosted - 138 combat (summoning) - Nex items - Dungeoneering items - PvP items - Working Guthans - Working Overloads/Extremes - Advanced bosses - All working stats - Curses - Frosts dragon & Strykewyrms - Fights caves - Money pouch - Devoted staff
[u][b]Owners [/b][/u]
[u]Ryan & Revi[/u]
[b]Admins[/b]
zezima
[b]Mods[/b]
-
Featured items [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img407/4369/screeny2a.png[/img]
Shops [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img542/9315/screeny6.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img547/2439/screeny5.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img10/8581/screeny8.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img825/9752/screeny7.png[/img]
Bosses [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img17/6411/screeny9.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img14/2434/screeny10.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img708/9194/screeny11.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img593/1608/screeny12.png[/img]
